post.summary:
UpdateParams defines a (governance) operation for updating the module
parameters.
The authority defaults to the x/gov module account.

parameters.description: MsgUpdateParams is the Msg/UpdateParams request type.
parameters.name: body

post.summary: Upload defines the method for uploading a file to the gateway

gwc.gateway.v1.MsgUpdateParams.description: MsgUpdateParams is the Msg/UpdateParams request type.

authority.description: authority is the address that controls the module (defaults to x/gov unless overwritten).

params.description:
params defines the module parameters to update.

NOTE: All parameters must be supplied.

gwc.gateway.v1.MsgUpdateParamsResponse.description:
MsgUpdateParamsResponse defines the response structure for executing a
MsgUpdateParams message.

gwc.gateway.v1.MsgUpload.title: MsgUpload defines the request type for uploading a file

gwc.gateway.v1.Params.description: Params defines the parameters for the module.
